# RSL/A

> RSL/A architects intelligent marketing systems for scaling businesses. We specialize in AI automation, paid advertising, CRM infrastructure, and smart website development based in Manhattan, New York.

## About

RSL/A is a marketing and AI automation agency helping service businesses, local businesses, and B2B companies scale through systems engineering. Founded by Rahul Lalia, we combine technical expertise with marketing strategy to deliver measurable ROI.

## Case Studies

- [Market Research Automation](https://rsla.io/api/work/market-research-data-scraping-automation): $136K/year savings, 87.5% time reduction through automated web scraping and data extraction
- [Salon Marketing Automation](https://rsla.io/api/work/salon-marketing-automation-roi): 60X ROAS, $36K annual revenue through Meta Ads + CRM automation
- [AI Cold Email Personalization](https://rsla.io/api/work/ai-cold-email-personalization): $43K/year savings, 94% time reduction with AI-powered outreach
- [Nonprofit CRM Volunteer Management](https://rsla.io/api/work/nonprofit-crm-volunteer-automation): $40K/year savings, 2000+ volunteers managed
- [Local SEO Reputation Management](https://rsla.io/api/work/local-seo-reputation-management): 118 new reviews, $25K revenue in 60 days
- [AI Proposal Generator](https://rsla.io/api/work/ai-proposal-generator-sales-workflow): $22K/year savings, 92% time reduction
- [Marketing Analytics Reporting](https://rsla.io/api/work/marketing-analytics-reporting-automation): 96% time reduction, $18K/year savings
- [AI Lead Response Autoresponder](https://rsla.io/api/work/ai-lead-response-autoresponder): 24-second response time, 24/7 coverage
- [SEO Content Marketing Automation](https://rsla.io/api/work/seo-content-marketing-automation): $18K/year savings, 4X content output
- [Field Service Operations](https://rsla.io/api/work/field-service-operations-automation): 100% operations consolidated on GoHighLevel
- [Media Content Operations AI](https://rsla.io/api/work/media-content-operations-ai): 70% workload reduction through AI assistance
- [IoT Manufacturing Robot Tracking](https://rsla.io/api/work/iot-manufacturing-robot-tracking): 10Hz real-time streaming for factory robots

## Services

- **AI Automation**: Custom AI agents for bookings, support, sales, and content generation
- **Paid Acquisition**: Meta & Google ad campaigns engineered for ROI with precise targeting
- **CRM Infrastructure**: GoHighLevel pipelines, automations, and database reactivation
- **Smart Websites**: SEO-optimized Next.js websites built for conversion
